title: string types
description: This schema defines types for strings

string.description: If a string depends in no case on a language and if no restrictions on the string are possible, then this type is used.

stringLatinHyphen.description: If a string is limited to characters of the Latin alphabet and hyphens, then this type is used.

latinDigitsPunctuation.description: If a string is limited to characters of the Latin alphabet, digits and punctuation, then this type is used.

ascii.description: If a string is limited to ASCII characters, then this type is used.

en-US.description: A string in American English. It must consist of ASCII characters.

internationalString.description: It has been decided to keep everything in English so far. If other languages are included at a later stage, this structure makes it easy.
